navbar.title: The essence of the Cantabrian Sea in Valencia

home.description: Fresh fish and seafood selected daily from the best markets in the north
home.specialtiesDescription: Daily selection of the highest quality products
home.aboutText: Since 1995, La Casita de Sabino has brought the best of the Cantabrian Sea to Valencia. Our passion for fresh products and traditional cuisine has made us a reference in seafood gastronomy in the Valencian Community.
home.menuDescription: Discover our selection of fresh fish and seafood of the day, prepared with the respect that Cantabrian products deserve.
home.winesDescription: A carefully curated list of national and international wines, selected to perfectly pair with our dishes.
home.pickupDescription: Enjoy our dishes at home. We offer takeaway orders from Wednesday to Sunday.

pickupSteps.text: Pick it up at your preferred time

about.title: About Us
about.text: Welcome to La Casita de Sabino, a place where good food and fine wine come together.
about.description: Our story began with a dream... everything you need to know about our history and the values that define us.
